Name: In Between Games
About the game: Alex is a fan of video-games since he is 7. One night, while he was playing as the storm rages outside, he got his mind and body transferred into his console and TV! To get out he has to take the place of his beloved heroes : Nario, Pegaman and Lonic and beat the levels! Features : Three different universes with three different gameplays! A simple story, but yet animated! A game suitable for everyone. Controller support. Chiptunes music to make you feel nostalgic.
